response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and quality, it is worth $10,000 to me. However, considering the mutual benefits we can achieve together, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your potential as a valuable client and to foster a long-term partnership. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
